name: Surfin Bird
description:
fight for food in a post-apocalyptic world!

Find and collect food in the area and transport it to your base.

Attack others players with found firearms to kill them and steal supplies they were carrying.

Do not care about others. You have families to feed.

CONTROLS:

Player 1 - keyboard -

WSAD - movement, H - fire

Player 2,3,4 - game pad

left analog - movement, X/A - fire

TEAM MEMBERS:

MICHAł ERTNER - GAME DESIGN, MENU, AUDIO

DAMIAN KUBIK - 3D MODELS

MARTYNA ŁĘCKA - MAP

TOMASZ SUŚ - SCRIPTS

JAKUB TRĄD - SCRIPTS

MADE FOR SENSEI GAMEJAM 2016
